text: [Music]
43% of Americans work remotely at least
some of the time going to work doesn't
always mean going into an office ready
to ditch your desk to simple mobile
wants to help here are five ways your
smartphone can help you work from home
number one download helpful apps it's
not just email download apps that
simplify how you track expenses flight
schedules and project timelines when
you're on the go
number two use cloud technology
don't let distance from your team hold
you back create and edit documents on
the cloud for virtual collaboration in
real time number three have work/life
balance for your phone when you're not
heading into an office it can feel like
you never get to leave work but your
phone's features can help you can create
separate work and personal accounts on
select devices or try turning off
notifications on specific work-related
apps so you can keep from overworking
number four use voice technology your
smartphone's voice technology makes it
easier and safer to save a quick thought
or send an email from the road number
five get a reliable wireless service
plan simple mobile offers a powerful
wireless experience with nationwide
coverage on a lightning-fast 4G LTE
network with no contract ever explore
their plans and sign up online at simple
mobile comm
